T03D3801:106b-9: lam la 'jug pa yang mdo ji lta ba bzhin te /

T03D3801:106b-11: tshad med pa'i rab tu 'jug pa bshad par bya ste /
T03D3801:106b-12: sems can dpag tu med pas dmigs pa'i phyir tshad med pa'o //
T03D3801:106b-18: de la bde ba yang dag par ldan pa'i bsam pa ni byams pa'o //
T03D3801:106b-19: sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i bsam pa ni snying rje'o //
T03D3801:106b-20: bde ba dang mi 'bral ba'i bsam pa ni dga' ba'o //
T03D3801:106b-21: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang mi ldan pa'i bsam pa ni btang snyoms so //
T03D3801:106b-22: kye ma ma la sems can thams cad bde ba dang ldan par smon pa dang /
T03D3801:106b-23: sdug bsngal dang bral bar smon pa dang /
T03D3801:106b-24: bde ba dang mi 'bral bar smon pa dang /
T03D3801:106b-25: nyon mongs pa las grol bar smon pa dang /
T03D3801:106b-26: bzhi po yang mos pas spyod pa'i sa la ni sems can la dmigs pa'o //
T03D3801:106b-27: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa bdun la ni chos la dmigs pa'o //
T03D3801:106b-28: de las gong mar gyur pa rnams la ni dmigs pa med pa'o //
T03D3801:106b-29: byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis zhes bya ba la /
T03D3801:106b-30: 'di tsam gyis ni yon tan dang ldan par bstan to //
T03D3801:106b-31: lhag mas ni yon tan bstan to //
T03D3801:106b-32: yangs pa zhes bya bas ni bsam pa chen po bstan to //
T03D3801:106b-33: chen pos zhes bya bas ni 'phel ba'o //
T03D3801:106b-34: tshad med pas zhes bya bas ni dmigs pa las so //
T03D3801:106b-35: mi gnyis pa zhes bya bas ni bdag nyid gcig
T03D3801:106b-36: pa nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro
T03D3801:106b-37: // 'gran zla med pa zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:106b-38: de la byams pa la sogs pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni go rims bzhin du gnod sems dang /
T03D3801:106b-41: rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dag go //
T03D3801:106b-42: lhod pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gnyid dang /
T03D3801:106b-43: rmugs pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:106b-44: sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rgod pa dang 'gyod pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:107a-1: zhes bya ba ni gsum po de dag nyid kyis sems dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:107a-2: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba
T03D3801:107a-3: ni bshes dang dgra dang tha mal pa gsum po
T03D3801:107a-4: dag la yang dag par rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir
T03D3801:107a-5: ro // shin tu bsgoms pa zhes bya ba ni
T03D3801:107a-6: ji skad brjod pa'i rnam pas gsum po dag la
T03D3801:107a-7: mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:107a-8: rgyas par yang zhes bya ba ni khyab pa'o //
T03D3801:107a-9: 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi 'jig rten no //
T03D3801:107a-10: thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni lha dang /
T03D3801:107a-12: gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i dbye bas thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
T03D3801:107a-13: phyogs gcig ces bya ba ni phyogs gcig tu gyur pa'o //
T03D3801:107a-15: 'jig rten du zhes gsungs te snod kyi 'jig rten du'o //
T03D3801:107a-16: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings bzhin du mtha' yas pa'o //
T03D3801:107a-17: nam mkha'i khams bzhin du 'di la mtha' gtugs pa yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
T03D3801:107a-18: nye bar bsgrubs te zhes bya ba ni sems yang dag par byas pas so //
T03D3801:107a-19: gnas so zhes bya bas ni 'phags pa'i gnas pas so //
T03D3801:107a-20: phyogs bcur zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcur gyur pa'o //
T03D3801:107a-21: de ltar zhes bya ba ni rtogs par sla'o //
T03D3801:107a-22: sems yangs pa zhes bya ba ni snying rje dang dga' ba dag la yang brjod par bya'o //
T03D3801:107a-23: tshad med pa dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3801:107a-24: drug gi go cha bzhin du mdo'i rjes su 'brang
T03D3801:107a-25: ste / de ni tshad med pa'i 'jug pa'o //
T03D3801:107a-26: de'i 'og tu tshig drug gis ni theg pa chen
T03D3801:107a-27: po la mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa'o
T03D3801:107a-28: // 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i 'jug pa ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin no//
T03D3801:107a-29: bsgom pa dang rnam par bsgom pa'i don du zhes bya ba la /
T03D3801:107a-30: bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni bsgom par bya ba dang /
T03D3801:107a-31: sgom pa po'i gzugs la sogs pa cung zad kyang med pa'o //
T03D3801:107a-32: de bas na chos 'di dag thams cad ni ming tsam ste /
T03D3801:107a-34: de'i rnam par bsgom pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o //
T03D3801:107a-35: de'i don ni bsgom pa'i de'i don du ste /
T03D3801:107a-37: mngon par shes pa drug gi 'jug pa ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //
T03D3801:107a-38: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jug pa ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //
T03D3801:107a-39: 'jug pa'i sgrub pa bshad nas tshogs kyi bsgrub pa bshad par bya ste /
T03D3801:107b-0: de yang bstan @107b bcos mdzad pas /
T03D3801:107b-1: brtse dang sbyin la sogs pa drug / zhi gnas lhag mthong bcas pa dang //
T03D3801:107b-2: zung du 'brel ba'i lam gang dang //
T03D3801:107b-3: thabs la mkhas pa gang yin dang //
T03D3801:107b-4: ye shes dang ni bsod nams dang //
T03D3801:107b-5: lam dang gzungs dang sa bcu dang //
T03D3801:107b-6: gnyen po'i tshogs kyi bsgrub pa yi //
T03D3801:107b-7: rig pa yin par shes par bya //
T03D3801:107b-19: zung du 'brel ba'i lam gyi tshogs dang /
T03D3801:107b-20: thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs dang /
T03D3801:107b-27: de la snying rje'i tshogs ni sems can shin tu
T03D3801:107b-28: mang po rnams ngan song dag las rnam par bkrol
T03D3801:107b-29: te / lha dang mi'i dngos po la sogs pa thob par byed pa las snying rje'i tshogs te /
T03D3801:107b-30: mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //
T03D3801:107b-31: sbyin pa la sogs pa drug gi tshogs ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //
T03D3801:107b-32: bdag gam phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad pha rol
T03D3801:107b-33: tu phyin pa drug po de dag la rab tu
T03D3801:107b-35: de ni zhi gnas kyi tshogs so //
T03D3801:107b-36: sems can dpag tu med pa thams cad lam de'i
T03D3801:107b-37: 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa 'di ni zhi
T03D3801:107b-39: sems can gzhal du med pa rnams pha rol tu
T03D3801:107b-40: phyin pa nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi
T03D3801:107b-41: bar du bkod kyang 'ga' yang bkod pa med de
T03D3801:107b-42: / sprul pa lta bu nyid kyi phyir dang /
T03D3801:107b-43: thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T03D3801:107b-44: chos thams cad ma byas rnam par ma byas pa mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:107b-45: rnam par ma byas pa ni 'phel ba dang nyams pa dag go //
T03D3801:107b-46: mngon par 'dus byas pa ni yon tan gyi khyad par rnams kyis so //
T03D3801:107b-47: de ni lhag mthong gi tshogs so //
T03D3801:107b-48: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ni zung ngo //
T03D3801:107b-49: de dang 'brel ba'i phyir zung du 'brel ba'i lam mo //
T03D3801:108a-0: 'brel zhing bcings pa ni yang dag par @108a * //
T03D3801:108a-2: grol ba ni mi ldan pa'o //
T03D3801:108a-3: med pa dang dben pa dang zhi ba nyid kyi phyir de gnyi ga mi dmigs te /
T03D3801:108a-4: de'i phyir chos thams cad ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
T03D3801:108a-5: de'i zung du 'brel ba'i lam gyi tshogs so //
T03D3801:108a-6: theg pa chen po ni gang lags /
T03D3801:108a-7: ci tsam gyis na yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba lags /
T03D3801:108a-8: de ni gang nas 'byung ba lags /
T03D3801:108a-9: de ni gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags /
T03D3801:108a-10: des ni su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba lnga ni rab 'byor gyis zhus pa'o //
T03D3801:108a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T03D3801:108a-12: pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni theg pa chen po'o //
T03D3801:108a-13: de yang mdo ji lta ba bzhin te /
T03D3801:108a-14: de ni thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs so //
T03D3801:108a-15: mdo 'di las gsungs pa'i stong pa nyid nyi shu ni ye shes kyi tshogs so //
T03D3801:108a-16: de nye bar dgod pa dang bshad pa ni mdo nyid las so //
T03D3801:108a-17: de la mi gsal ba bshad par bya ste /
T03D3801:108a-18: yongs su brtags pa'i ngo bos thams cad med de /
T03D3801:108a-19: med pa de'i phyir gnas pa med cing 'jig pa med de /
T03D3801:108a-20: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa med ces bya ba'i don to //
T03D3801:108a-22: phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba la ni
T03D3801:108a-23: nang ni phyis stong ste yul med pa'i phyir ro
T03D3801:108a-24: // phyi ni nang gis stong ste de dag gi yul can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:108a-25: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni
T03D3801:108a-26: chos thams cad kyi so so'am bsdus pa stong pa
T03D3801:108a-27: nyid de / de nyid kyis stong pa ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
T03D3801:108a-28: chen po stong pa nyid ni phyogs rnams kyi stong pa nyid do //
T03D3801:108a-29: phyogs bcur khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:108a-32: gzhan du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid de /
T03D3801:108a-34: rgyun chad pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T03D3801:108a-38: phyi ma rgyun mi 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3801:108a-39: de las bzlog pa ni 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T03D3801:108a-40: de gnyis stong pa nyid ni go rims bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
T03D3801:108a-41: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
T03D3801:108a-42: mtha' med pas na mtha' las 'das pa ste /
T03D3801:108a-44: de'i stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de /
T03D3801:108a-45: thog ma dang tha ma dag gi mtha' med pa'i
T03D3801:108b-0: phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste @108b
T03D3801:108b-1: 'khor ba'o // de stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //
T03D3801:108b-2: dor ba med pa ni gtang bar bya ba ma yin pa ste theg pa chen po'o //
T03D3801:108b-3: de'i stong pa nyid ni dor pa med pa stong pa nyid do //
T03D3801:108b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pas ma byas pa'i phyir rang bzhin te /
T03D3801:108b-5: chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi chos nyid de de'i stong pa nyid do //
T03D3801:108b-6: dus gsum phan tshun mi dmigs pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa ste de'i stong pa nyid do //
T03D3801:108b-7: 'dus byas pa las byung ba'i ngo bo de ni
T03D3801:108b-8: dngos po med pa yang ma yin la ngo bo
T03D3801:108b-9: nyid kyang yin pas na dngos po med pa'i ngo
T03D3801:108b-10: bo'o // sbyor ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid de ji ltar med ce na /
T03D3801:108b-11: nye bar len pa yod kyang gzhan med na med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:108b-12: de nyid kyi phyir 'dus pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi dngos po med pa ste /
T03D3801:108b-13: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
T03D3801:108b-14: de stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
T03D3801:108b-16: de de'i bdag nyid kyis stong pa nyid ni dngos po stong pa nyid do //
T03D3801:108b-17: skye ba med pas na dngos po med pa ste /
T03D3801:108b-18: de de'i bdag nyid kyis stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //
T03D3801:108b-19: chos rnams kyi phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bo ni rang gi ngo bo ste /
T03D3801:108b-20: ye shes dang mthong ba dag gis ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:108b-21: de ni de'i bdag nyid kyis stong pa nyid do //
T03D3801:108b-22: 'di ni dam pa yang yin pa'i phyir gzhan yang
T03D3801:108b-23: yin la gzhan gyis ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid
T03D3801:108b-24: yin pa'i phyir ngo bo yang yin pas de ni
T03D3801:108b-27: de ni de'i bdag nyid kyis stong pa nyid de /
T03D3801:108b-28: de ni ye shes kyi tshogs so //
T03D3801:108b-29: de na dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T03D3801:108b-30: nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol
T03D3801:108b-31: zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis
T03D3801:108b-32: ting nge 'dzin dag ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T03D3801:108b-33: sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par mi rtog pa
T03D3801:108b-34: zag pa med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems
T03D3801:108b-36: sngon gyi yid la byed pa'i stobs kyis so so
T03D3801:108b-37: sor bya ba byed pa na ming sna tshogs su
T03D3801:108b-38: brjod do // de nyid dang ldan pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so //
T03D3801:108b-39: lam gyi tshogs bshad par bya ste /
T03D3801:108b-40: byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa ni lam mo //
T03D3801:109a-0: de la gang gis yang dag par shes pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag @109a * //
T03D3801:109a-2: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag ni dmigs pa'i bye brag gis bzhi ste /
T03D3801:109a-3: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T03D3801:109a-4: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T03D3801:109a-5: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T03D3801:109a-6: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
T03D3801:109a-7: de la nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su
T03D3801:109a-8: lta zhing gnas nas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus
T03D3801:109a-9: dang ldan pa'i rtog pas rnam par mi rtog go
T03D3801:109a-10: // phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba yang de bzhin no //
T03D3801:109a-11: phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba yang de bzhin no //
T03D3801:109a-13: phyi nang gi tshor ba dang /
T03D3801:109a-15: chos dag la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba nas /
T03D3801:109a-16: chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i bar gyis gnas nas
T03D3801:109a-17: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta
T03D3801:109a-18: zhing rtul ba dang shes bzhin can dran pa dang
T03D3801:109a-19: ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /
T03D3801:109a-20: yid mi bde ba bsal zhing rnam par dpyod kyang
T03D3801:109a-21: chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par
T03D3801:109a-22: mi rtog go // de la nang gi lus ni rang gi mig la sogs pa drug go //
T03D3801:109a-23: phyi'i lus ni rang gi lus las phyi rol gyi 'dus byas so //
T03D3801:109a-24: phyi nang gi lus ni rang gi lus su gyur
T03D3801:109a-25: pa'i lhag ma 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur
T03D3801:109a-26: pa'o // tshor ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa gsum yang yang //
T03D3801:109a-27: lus rnam pa gsum la dmigs pa'i bya bas so //
T03D3801:109a-28: tshor ba ni bde ba dang /
T03D3801:109a-31: bde ba yang ma yin pa'o //
T03D3801:109a-32: chos ni sems las byung ba dge ba dang mi dge ba'o //
T03D3801:109a-33: lus la sogs pa la rjes su lta ba zhes
T03D3801:109a-34: bya ba ni lus la sogs pa'i chos nyid la
T03D3801:109a-36: lus la sogs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba
T03D3801:109a-37: ni lus la sogs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa'o
T03D3801:109a-38: // rtog pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03D3801:109a-39: lus 'di gcig dang bdag gi lus dang /
T03D3801:109a-43: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs
T03D3801:109a-44: pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de rjes su mi
T03D3801:109a-45: mthong zhing rnam par mi rtog go //
T03D3801:109a-46: gus par byed pa dang rtag tu byed pa dang ldan pa'i rtul ba dang ldan pa'o //
T03D3801:109a-48: shes bzhin dang ldan pa ni shes bzhin can no //
T03D3801:109a-49: mi brjed pa'i bdag nyid kyis kun tu srung bar byed pa dang /
T03D3801:109a-50: rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i dran pa dang 'brel pas dran pa dang ldan pa'o //
T03D3801:109b-3: 'di dag nyid kyi phan yon ni 'jig rten gyi
T03D3801:109b-4: chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal
T03D3801:109b-5: zhes gsungs so // bsal ba zhes bya ba ni spangs pa'o //
T03D3801:109b-6: 'jig rten gyi chos la rnyed pa dang /
T03D3801:109b-9: bstod pa dag la ni brnab sems dang /
T03D3801:109b-14: smod pa la ni yid mi bde ba'o //
T03D3801:109b-15: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul la dran pa
T03D3801:109b-16: nye bar gzhag pa bstan nas nyan thos kyi tshul
T03D3801:109b-17: la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam
T03D3801:109b-19: de la shes bzhin gyi sgo nas ni gsum ste /
T03D3801:109b-20: dbugs ring du 'gro ba dang 'od ba la sogs pa de dag la ni gcig go //
T03D3801:109b-21: thung ngu 'ong ba la sogs pa dag la gnyis pa'o //
T03D3801:109b-22: dbyung ba dang rngub pa dran pa la ni gsum pa'o //
T03D3801:109b-23: khams kyi rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas ni bzhi pa'o ;
T03D3801:109b-24: / mi gtsang ba'i rdzas sum cu rtsa drug gi sgo nas ni lnga pa'o //
T03D3801:109b-25: mi sdug pa'i sgo nas ni dgu'o //
T03D3801:109b-26: de la mngon du 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'o //
T03D3801:109b-27: phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'o //
T03D3801:109b-28: kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba ni mdun du'o //
T03D3801:109b-29: rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba ni phyogs mtshams su'o //
T03D3801:109b-30: bskum par bya ba ni bsdus pa'o //
T03D3801:109b-31: nang du yang dag par 'jog pa ni zhi gnas dang /
T03D3801:109b-32: lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pa'o //
T03D3801:109b-33: dran pa 'di la yod pas na dran pa dang ldan pa'o //
T03D3801:109b-34: lus kyi rlung sna nas 'jug pa ni brngub pa'o //
T03D3801:109b-36: rdza mkhan legs par bslabs pa'am /
T03D3801:109b-37: de'i nye gnas kyi slob ma bzhin no //
T03D3801:109b-38: pags pa dang rlog pa ni phyi nang gi dbye bas so //
T03D3801:109b-44: zhu ba dang ma zhu ba ni zas so //
T03D3801:109b-45: mchil ma'i thal ba ni bad kan gyi gong bu'o //
T03D3801:109b-47: chun pa ni zhing rmo ba'o //
T03D3801:109b-48: bad pa ni 'bru rnams kyi snod do //
T03D3801:109b-49: dur khrod ces bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
T03D3801:109b-50: ro bor ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni rjes su bstan pa'o //
T03D3801:109b-51: shi nas zhag gcig lon pa zhes bya ba la
T03D3801:109b-52: sogs pa ni go rims bzhin rnam par bam pa
T03D3801:110a-1: par rnags pa de nyid ni rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa yin te /
T03D3801:110a-2: srin bu skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3801:110a-3: yang na rnam par zos pa ni rnam par 'thor ba'o //
T03D3801:110a-4: de la dur khrod kyi lus mthong ba na bdag

T03D3801:113a-43: rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba zhes bya ba

T03D3801:113b-6: 'jug pa dgu'o // kun nas nyon mongs pa la

T03D3801:113b-14: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang /

T03D3801:113b-17: nges par 'byin pa'i lam la mi 'jigs pa'o //
T03D3801:113b-18: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T03D3801:113b-19: mi 'jigs pa ni der dam 'cha' ba dang /
T03D3801:113b-20: dgod pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //

T03D3801:113b-23: mtshan nyid rgya cher ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //

T03D3801:114a-24: gzhan dag dang thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3801:114a-26: mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //

T03D3801:114a-28: gnyis pa dag gi las dang /
T03D3801:114a-29: de nas bzhi ni yid kyi las yongs su dag pa'o //

T03D3801:114a-31: 'bras bu dang bcas pa la ma thob pa'i yongs su nyams pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:114a-33: 'bras bu ni rnam par grol ba'o //

T03D3801:114a-40: des na gsum ste drug po de dag gis bco brgyad du 'gyur ro //
T03D3801:114a-41: 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba ni 'di

T03D3801:114b-4: mnga' ba ste / rtag tu yang dag par rtog par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3801:114b-5: ca co med pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar
T03D3801:114b-6: dgra bcom pa dag dgon pa na lam stor nas

T03D3801:114b-10: rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:114b-11: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba ni ji
T03D3801:114b-12: ltar dgra bcom pa rnams brjed pas bya ba shor

T03D3801:114b-14: thugs rje chen po mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:114b-15: thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa zhes bya

T03D3801:114b-17: tshe snyoms par zhugs pa nyid ni mnyam par gzhag

T03D3801:114b-20: rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //

T03D3801:114b-31: de ni dus la sogs pa so sor brtags nas yal bar 'jog pa yin gyi /

T03D3801:114b-33: 'dun pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba la

T03D3801:114b-40: thob pa rnams ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

T03D3801:115a-4: de rnams kyi sgo ni yi ge rnams so //

T03D3801:115a-15: thob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa'o //

T03D3801:148a-17: 'gog pa la ni go rims bzhin //

T03D3801:148a-33: nyon mongs pa med pa dang /

T03D3801:148b-1: zhe sdang med pa ni nyes pa med pa'i phyir ro //

T03D3801:148b-24: mi rtag pa nyid ni gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir te /
T03D3801:148b-25: 'jig pa med pa de nyid ni med pa de nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa ste /
T03D3801:148b-26: med pa'i don ni mi rtag pa'i don to //

T03D3801:148b-34: su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba nas dngos

T03D3801:148b-37: stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes

T03D3801:149a-2: lam gyi bden pa dang mthun par //

T03D3801:149a-5: slob ma byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T03D3801:149a-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rim bzhin du //

T03D3801:149a-10: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas brtsams te /
T03D3801:149a-11: sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam pa'i bar du rnam pa brgya rtsa bcu dag yin te /
T03D3801:149a-12: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas brtsams te /
T03D3801:149a-13: sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'o //
T03D3801:149a-14: tha ma sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam pa gang dag
T03D3801:149a-15: la yod pa da dag la de skad ces bya'o
T03D3801:149a-16: // kun mkhyen nyid rnam pa gsum gyi bye brag gis nyan thos dang /
T03D3801:149a-18: sangs rgyas dag gi lam gyi bden pa gang yin
T03D3801:149a-19: pa de dag dang mthun par go rims bzhin du
T03D3801:149a-21: sum cu rtsa bzhi dang sum cu rtsa dgu dag go //
T03D3801:149a-22: de la byang chub kyi phyogs dag gis nyan thos kyi lam la brten pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3801:149a-23: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /
T03D3801:149a-24: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /

T03D3801:149a-27: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i lam la brten pa'i phyir dang /

T03D3801:149a-31: ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad dang /
T03D3801:149a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03D3801:149a-34: sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi lam la brten pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3801:149a-35: 'dir chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i
T03D3801:149a-36: phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nyan thos la sogs
T03D3801:149a-37: pa'i chos rnams las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir
T03D3801:149a-38: ro // chos ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gsungs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do //
T03D3801:149a-40: sangs rgyas kyi brjod pa thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3801:149a-41: byung bar gyur pas na byung ba ste /
T03D3801:149a-42: byung bar gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //

T03D3801:149b-0: chos @149b thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3801:149b-1: ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid ce na //
T03D3801:149b-2: chos thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i phyir te /
T03D3801:149b-3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3801:149b-4: rnam pa rnams thams cad gcig tu byas na rnam pa brgya bdun cu rtsa gsum yin no //
T03D3801:149b-5: da ni sbyor ba brjod par bya ba yin pas
T03D3801:149b-6: bcom ldan 'das ma mnyan pa cung zad kyang rnyed
T03D3801:149b-7: par dka' na / ci rab tu sbyor ba lta zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3801:149b-8: sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti byas //
T03D3801:149b-9: de las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun //
T03D3801:149b-10: dge ba'i bshes kyi mgon bcas pa //
T03D3801:149b-11: 'di nyan pa yi snod yin no //
T03D3801:149b-13: sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs spyod dang //
T03D3801:149b-14: len dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i //
T03D3801:149b-15: snod du dam pa rnams bzhed do //
T03D3801:149b-17: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti byas pa dang /
T03D3801:149b-18: de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang /
T03D3801:149b-19: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa gang yin pa de dag 'di nyid nyan pa ste /
T03D3801:149b-20: rna lam du grag pa'i snod yin gyi /
T03D3801:149b-21: gzhan dag ni ma yin no //
T03D3801:149b-22: gang yang sngon gyi skye bar sangs rgyas mang po yongs su bsten pa dang /
T03D3801:149b-23: kun 'dri ba dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T03D3801:149b-24: pa drug la spyod pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan
T03D3801:149b-25: 'das ma len pa dang 'dzin pa nas /
T03D3801:149b-26: de bzhin nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3801:149b-27: phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa'i bar nyid
T03D3801:149b-29: rnam pa gzhan du ma yin no //
T03D3801:149b-30: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das ma rna lam
T03D3801:149b-31: du grag pa gang yin pa de dag ni nges
T03D3801:149b-32: par bkur sti byas pa la sogs pa yon tan
T03D3801:149b-33: gsum dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
T03D3801:149b-34: gang la len pa la sogs pa dang de bzhin
T03D3801:149b-35: nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni bkur
T03D3801:149b-36: sti byed pa la sogs pa yon tan gsum dang
T03D3801:149b-37: sangs rgyas bsten pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa
T03D3801:149b-38: yin no zhes bya bar nges par blta bar bya'o
T03D3801:149b-39: // gang de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /

T03D3801:149b-41: ba'i bar ni sbyor ba po rnyed par dka' ba
T03D3801:149b-42: nyid do // sbyor ba'i dbang du mdzad nas /

T03D3801:149b-44: de la sbyor ba bkag pa'i phyir //
T03D3801:150a-0: de yi de bzhin nyid zab @150a * //
T03D3801:150a-2: / de rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir //

T03D3801:150a-4: tshogs chen yun ring rtogs pa'i phyir //
T03D3801:150a-5: lung bstan phyir mi ldog nyid dang //

T03D3801:150a-7: byang chub nye dang myur ba dang //

T03D3801:150a-13: 'bras bu rin chen sbyin byed dang //
T03D3801:150a-14: de ni dag pa mtshams dang bcas //
T03D3801:150a-15: zhes bya ba gsungs pa la /

T03D3801:150a-18: rnam par sbyor bar bcas pa zhes gong du bstan
T03D3801:150a-19: pa de la rnam par bstan nas sbyor ba'i skabs
T03D3801:150a-21: gzugs la sogs la mi gnas phyir //
T03D3801:150a-22: zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa de dag la mi gnas pa ni sbyor ba'o //
T03D3801:150a-23: gang koo shi ka zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03D3801:150a-24: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so
T03D3801:150a-25: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gzugs la sogs pa la
T03D3801:150a-26: mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba gsungs so //
T03D3801:150a-27: de la sbyor ba bkag pa'i phyir //
T03D3801:150a-28: zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa la sbyor ba bkag pa'i spyor ba ste /
T03D3801:150a-29: gang rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03D3801:150a-30: dbus su mi dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis
T03D3801:150a-31: gzugs la sogs pa la mi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba
T03D3801:150a-32: gsungs so // de yi de bzhin nyid zab phyir //
T03D3801:150a-33: zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i de bzhin
T03D3801:150a-34: nyid zab pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ma zab bo
T03D3801:150a-35: // de nas tshe dang ldan pa zhes bya ba
T03D3801:150a-36: nas zab bo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni zab
T03D3801:150a-38: de rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir //
T03D3801:150a-39: zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir /

T03D3801:150a-45: gzugs la sogs pa tshad med pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das mtshan med pa'o //
T03D3801:150a-46: gang gsol pa zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3801:150b-0: tshad med de zhes bya ba'i @150b par gyis ni tshad med pa'i sbyor ba gsungs so //
T03D3801:150b-1: 'dir dang gi sgra khong nas dbyung bar bya ste /
T03D3801:150b-2: de la sbyor ba bkag pa nyid ces bya ba 'dir rjes su drang ba'i don to //

T03D3801:150b-4: gting dpag dka' ba nyid dang /
T03D3801:150b-5: tshad med pa nyid la spyod pa dgag pa'i sbyor ba gsungs te /
T03D3801:150b-6: gzugs la sogs pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod
T03D3801:150b-7: na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3801:150b-8: spyod do // de bzhin du gting dpag dka' ba
T03D3801:150b-9: zhes bya ba dang tshad med pa zhes bya ba
T03D3801:150b-10: spyod do // ste / gang gsol pa zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3801:150b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma yin
T03D3801:150b-12: no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis zab pa la mi
T03D3801:150b-13: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba gsungs so //
T03D3801:150b-14: gzhan yang zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos
T03D3801:150b-15: rnams kyi bar du ma yin no zhes bya ba'i

T03D3801:150b-18: gzhan yang zhes bya ba nas /

T03D3801:150b-20: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis tshad med pa la mi
T03D3801:150b-21: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba gsungs so //
T03D3801:150b-22: tshogs chen yun ring rtogs pa'i phyir //
T03D3801:150b-24: bcom ldan 'das ma zab pa nyid dang /
T03D3801:150b-25: gting dpag dka' ba nyid dang /
T03D3801:150b-26: tshad med pa de dag ni theg pa la gsar
T03D3801:150b-27: du zhugs pa'i mdun du brjod par mi bya ste

T03D3801:150b-29: tshogs chen pos yun ring po nas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro //
T03D3801:150b-30: sha ra dva ti'i bus gsol ba zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3801:150b-31: dka' ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do zhes bya
T03D3801:150b-32: ba'i bar gyis tshogs chen pos yun ring po nas
T03D3801:150b-33: rtogs pa'i sbor ba gsungs so //
T03D3801:150b-34: lung bstan zhes bya ba ni gang gis bcom ldan
T03D3801:150b-35: 'das ma zab mo 'di thos nas skrag par mi
T03D3801:150b-36: 'gyur / thos nas kyang gong nas gong du 'dzin pa nas /
T03D3801:150b-37: gnas pa'i bar de ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig
T03D3801:150b-38: gam gnyis sam gsum las mi 'da' bar yang dag

T03D3801:150b-40: par 'gyur ro // gang brgya byin gyi zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3801:150b-41: nye bar 'gyur bar rig par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis lung bstan pa'i sbyor ba gsungs so //
T03D3801:150b-42: phyir mi ldog nyid ces bya ba ni gang byang
T03D3801:150b-43: chub sems dpa' de dag phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
T03D3801:151a-1: nyid la bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nye bar 'gyur te /
T03D3801:151a-2: nye bar gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa nas tshul bzhin
T03D3801:151a-3: yid la byed pa'i bar gyis de byang chub tu
T03D3801:151a-4: lung bstan pa rnyed pa dang nye bar 'gyur ro
T03D3801:151a-5: // bcom ldan 'das gang gis zhes bya ba nas
T03D3801:151a-6: phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis phyir
T03D3801:151a-7: mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba gsungs so //
T03D3801:151a-8: nges 'byung zhes bya ba ni bar du gcod pa'i sa las shin tu rgal ba ste /
T03D3801:151a-9: der bcom ldan 'das ma nyid nye bar gyur pas

T03D3801:151a-16: snga ltas so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni nges par 'byung ba'i sbyor ba gsungs sa //

T03D3801:151a-18: na rgya mtsher 'gro ba'i ri la sogs par bar
T03D3801:151a-19: chad dang bral ba'i sa phyogs su phyin pa rgya
T03D3801:151a-20: mtshor phyin pa dang nye ba de bzhin du bcom
T03D3801:151a-21: ldan 'das ma mthong ba la sogs pa'i don rnyed
T03D3801:151a-23: tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byang
T03D3801:151a-24: chub tu lung bstan pa rnyed pa dang nye ba'o
T03D3801:151a-25: // gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3801:151a-26: tshul bzhin yid la byar yod ces bgyi bar rig
T03D3801:151a-27: par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bar chad med
T03D3801:151a-28: pa dang bcas pa'i sbyor ba gsungs so //
T03D3801:151a-29: byang chub nye bar zhes bya ba la /
T03D3801:151a-30: dper na sdong po lo ma lhags pa dang nye
T03D3801:151a-31: bar shes pa na de dag gi lo ma dang
T03D3801:151a-32: me tog dang 'bras bu de dag ni ring po
T03D3801:151a-33: mi thogs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du
T03D3801:151a-34: 'di lta bu'i lam la sogs pa'i don rnyed pa
T03D3801:151a-35: nas tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i bar ni yang
T03D3801:151a-36: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye pa yin
T03D3801:151a-37: no // gang bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3801:151a-38: bde zhing nyams bde bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i
T03D3801:151a-39: bar gyis byang chub dang nye ba'i sbyor ba gsungs
T03D3801:151a-40: so // myur ba zhes bya ba ni byang chub tu zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

T03D3801:202b-42: ba la sogs pas ni bcom ldan 'das kyi lan
